title: Bug 118780: Set alias for columns in data set, but in expression builder, still shows the old column name when selecting the dataset.
OB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder and double-clicking on the first column name, the original name of the column is listed below the expression builder, but the alias name is shown as row["column1"] above the expression builder.
EB: In the expression builder, when selecting the dataset and double-clicking the first column name, the alias name should be displayed instead of the original column name, as specified in SCR 78193 in the tracker.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the expression builder.
2. Select the dataset.
3. Double-click on the first column name.
